markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Draw from the Land](/Feats.aspx?ID=3000) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 213 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Geomancer](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=100)

**Prerequisites**
[Geomancer Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2995); Expert in [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)

**Requirements**
You gained a terrain attunement benefit this turn, and it matched the terrain you're in.

</column>

---

You pull strength from the surrounding terrain. You gain temporary Hit Points equal to your level. They last for 1 round. If you previously gained the plains terrain attunement effect this turn, combine the temporary Hit Points together.
name: Draw from the Land
requirement: You gained a terrain attunement benefit this turn, and it matched the terrain you're in.
requirement_markdown: You gained a terrain attunement benefit this turn, and it matched the terrain you're in.
